note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: HtmlSlide application
tagline: HTML Slide presentation based on backbone and jquery
body:
### Welcome to HTML Slide
    This is a simple application built on backbone and jquery for making 
presentation slides on HTML.If you don't have MS PowerPoint , you can use this. 

### Prerequisites
jQuery
backbone
underscore
handlebar

### Authors and Contributors
https://github.com/gsuresh86

### Support or Contact
Catch me @ gsuresh86@gmail.com
